Body: I am sure many people have noticed that in the stock keyboard (Android 4.2 in my case) has more language layouts than it supports predicting. For many languages a dictionary / corpus is missing.So since it is rather easy to build a corpus, I wanted to add my own dictionary for some languages which have no official dictionary. But I cannot find any solution. Has this been achieved before?Note: Adding the words 1 by 1 is not a solution. :-)If there was a solution, many people would be helped I guess. Thanks for any help and hint given!
Title: Add user (personal) dictionary to Android stock keyboard for unsupported languages

history.Text: I am sure many people have noticed that in the stock keyboard (Android 4.2 in my case) has more language layouts than it supports predicting. For many languages a dictionary / corpus is missing.So since it is rather easy to build a corpus, I wanted to add my own dictionary for some languages which have no official dictionary. But I cannot find any solution. Has this been achieved before?Note: *Adding the words 1 by 1 is not a solution*. :-)If there was a solution, many people would be helped I guess. Thanks for any help and hint given!
